body_html: This is expected behavior AFAIK, in general, multithreaded Sparse MM is inefficient for most workloads, and it's difficult to detect the cases when it is. If it's important to you, there is a multithreaded implementation in Torch which may be useful for your workloads.
body_text: This is expected behavior AFAIK, in general, multithreaded Sparse MM is inefficient for most workloads, and it's difficult to detect the cases when it is. If it's important to you, there is a multithreaded implementation in Torch which may be useful for your workloads.
body: This is expected behavior AFAIK, in general, multithreaded Sparse MM is inefficient for most workloads, and it's difficult to detect the cases when it is. If it's important to you, there is a multithreaded implementation in [Torch](https://github.com/torch/nn/blob/master/lib/THNN/generic/SparseLinear.c) which may be useful for your workloads.
